description: Meme Creator - Simple and Ad-Free 😌 Simple Meme Creator - Completly ad-free and adds no watermarks. Memes can be created from image templates in MemeTastic pictures folder, from pictures shared into the app and pictures from gallery & camera. No internet connection required or used. There are many meme customization options available: 😄 Top & bottom caption 😃 Font & border text color 😁 Text size, font and capitalization 😃 Padding size & color 😜 Rotate picture More Features: 👓 Show saved memes & favorites 👉 Share into any app accepting pictures Support the project: ✋ Translate using Stringlate ✋ Join discussion on Matrix ✋ More information about contributions
